name.description: Name of the security group. If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique name.

egress.description: Configuration block for egress rules. Can be specified multiple times for each egress rule.
egress.type: list(object({ from_port: number, to_port: number, cidr_blocks: list(string), description: string, ipv6_cidr_blocks: list(string), prefix_list_ids: optional(list(string)), protocol: string, security_groups: list(string), self: bool}))

ingress.description: Configuration block for ingress rules. Can be specified multiple times for each ingress rule.
ingress.type: list(object({ from_port: number, to_port: number, protocol: string, cidr_blocks: list(string), description: string, ipv6_cidr_blocks: list(string), prefix_list_ids: optional(list(string)), security_groups: list(string), self: bool}))

revoke_rules_on_delete.description: Whether to revoke all rules in the security group when the security group is deleted.

tags.description: A map of tags to add to the resource
